name: UIButton
desc: A control that executes your custom code in response to user interactions.

items.name: UIButton.ButtonType
items.desc: Specifies the style of a button.

items.name: systemButton
items.desc: Creates and returns a system type button with specified image, target, and action.

items.name: titleLabel
items.desc: A view that displays the value of the currentTitle property for a button.

items.name: title
items.desc: Returns the title associated with the specified state.

items.name: setTitle
items.desc: Sets the title to use for the specified state.

items.name: attributedTitle
items.desc: Returns the styled title associated with the specified state.

items.name: setAttributedTitle
items.desc: Sets the styled title to use for the specified state.

items.name: titleColor
items.desc: Returns the title color used for a state.

items.name: setTitleColor
items.desc: Sets the color of the title to use for the specified state.

items.name: titleShadowColor
items.desc: Returns the shadow color of the title used for a state.

items.name: setTitleShadowColor
items.desc: Sets the color of the title shadow to use for the specified state.

items.name: reversesTitleShadowWhenHighlighted
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the title shadow changes when the button is highlighted.

items.name: adjustsImageWhenHighlighted
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the image changes when the button is highlighted.

items.name: adjustsImageWhenDisabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the image changes when the button is disabled.

items.name: showsTouchWhenHighlighted
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether tapping the button causes it to glow.

items.name: backgroundImage
items.desc: Returns the background image used for a button state.

items.name: image
items.desc: Returns the image used for a button state.

items.name: setBackgroundImage
items.desc: Sets the background image to use for the specified button state.

items.name: setImage
items.desc: Sets the image to use for the specified state.

items.name: preferredSymbolConfigurationForImage
items.desc: Returns the preferred symbol configuration for a button state.

items.name: setPreferredSymbolConfiguration
items.desc: Sets the preferred symbol configuration for a button state.

items.name: tintColor
items.desc: The tint color to apply to the button title and image.

items.name: contentEdgeInsets
items.desc: The inset or outset margins for the rectangle surrounding all of the button’s content.

items.name: titleEdgeInsets
items.desc: The inset or outset margins for the rectangle around the button’s title text.

items.name: imageEdgeInsets
items.desc: The inset or outset margins for the rectangle around the button’s image.

items.name: buttonType
items.desc: The button type.

items.name: currentTitle
items.desc: The current title that is displayed on the button.

items.name: currentAttributedTitle
items.desc: The current styled title that is displayed on the button.

items.name: currentTitleColor
items.desc: The color used to display the title.

items.name: currentTitleShadowColor
items.desc: The color of the title’s shadow.

items.name: currentImage
items.desc: The current image displayed on the button.

items.name: currentBackgroundImage
items.desc: The current background image displayed on the button.

items.name: currentPreferredSymbolConfiguration
items.desc: The current symbol size, style, and weight.

items.name: imageView
items.desc: The button’s image view.

items.name: backgroundRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its background.

items.name: contentRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its entire content.

items.name: titleRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its title.

items.name: imageRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle in which the receiver draws its image.

items.name: isPointerInteractionEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean that enables pointer interaction.

items.name: pointerStyleProvider
items.desc: The custom pointer style for a button.
